Uses of Interface
com.oryzone.mvdetector.differenceStrategy.IDifferenceStrategy

Packages that use IDifferenceStrategy
com.oryzone.mvdetector   
com.oryzone.mvdetector.differenceStrategy   
 

Uses of IDifferenceStrategy in com.oryzone.mvdetector
 

Fields in com.oryzone.mvdetector declared as IDifferenceStrategy
protected  IDifferenceStrategy ImageDifference.differenceStrategy
          An instance of a strategy that is used to calculate the difference between the previous and the current image
 

Uses of IDifferenceStrategy in com.oryzone.mvdetector.differenceStrategy
 

Classes in com.oryzone.mvdetector.differenceStrategy that implement IDifferenceStrategy
 class AbstractDifferenceStrategy
          Abstract class used as base to build specific difference strategies classes such as RgbDifferenceStrategy and GreyscaleDifferenceStrategy
 class GreyscaleDifferenceStrategy
          Difference strategy that converts the images to grey scale and calculate the difference as a difference between each grey tone pixel value.
 class RgbDifferenceStrategy
          Difference strategy that calculates the difference by subtracting each rgb value and making a pixel per pixel average.
